Class RCV1v2DatasetSource¶

class mbff.datasets.sources.RCV1v2DatasetSource.RCV1v2DatasetSource(configuration)[source]¶

A class which reads the RCV1v2 dataset files, as published by LYRL2004.

Variables:
  • sourcefolder – The folder where the downloaded RCV1v2 files are located.
  • sourcefile_documentIDs – The name of the file containing the list of all document IDs.
  • sourcefile_document_tokens – The name of the file containing all the documents of the dataset, in token form.
  • sourcefile_topic_assignments – The name of the file containing assignments of document IDs to topics.
  • sourcefile_industry_assignments – The name of the file containing assignments of document IDs to industries.
create_dataset_matrix(label='rcv1v2')[source]¶

The required method of a DatasetSource class. This method reads an external source of data and produces a DatasetMatrix instance based on configuration. The newly created DatasetMatrix instance is then returned.
